moduleMetadataJson.name: Amazon Web Services EC2 instance enumeration
moduleMetadataJson.description:
Provided AWS credentials, this module will call the authenticated
                          API of Amazon Web Services to list all EC2 instances associated
                          with the account
author: Aaron Soto <aaron.soto@rapid7.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: LIMIT
options.description: Only return the specified number of results from each region
